title: Potential for Self-Improvement
formulas: w/o SE: the answer is a directly deterministic output of the LLM.
w/ SE: LLM generates an answer and evaluates its correctness. If the evaluation indicates the answer is incorrect, LLM re-generates an answer as the final output.
summary: The slide discusses two answer generation strategies for LLMs, comparing their performance in various tasks with and without self-improvement. The strategies include direct deterministic output and iterative evaluation and re-generation for correctness.
